citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on August
2nd, 2024. The inspector called the facility representative at 1:12 PM after walking McMillen Park in Fort Wayne Indiana.
On July 30th, 2024 the Facility representative texted the inspector that they would be at McMillen Park from 1PM to 4PM.
At 2:20 PM the facility representative called the inspector back and said that they had been told Wednesday July 31st,
2024 that the event had been canceled due to rain, and then told this morning August 2nd, 2024 that there was not rain
and asked by the event coordinators if they could do the event. They had just arrived at McMillen Park shortly before the
licensee called the inspector. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 PM on August 
2nd, 2024. The inspector called the facility representative at 1:12 PM after walking McMillen Park in Fort Wayne Indiana. 
On July 30th, 2024 the Facility representative texted the inspector that they would be at McMillen Park from 1PM to 4PM. 
At 2:20 PM the facility representative called the inspector back and said that they had been told Wednesday July 31st, 
2024 that the event had been canceled due to rain, and then told this morning August 2nd, 2024 that there was not rain 
and asked by the event coordinators if they could do the event. They had just arrived at McMillen Park shortly before the 
licensee called the inspector. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious 
violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
